title: "New lensless camera creates 3D images from a single exposure"
excerpt: "Researchers have developed a camera that uses a thin microlens array and new image processing algorithms to capture 3D information about objects in a scene with a single exposure. The camera could be useful for a variety of applications such as industrial part inspection,"
